name: The Human Test
description:
Do you have the ability to react as fast as a human?

You are an alien who takes the body of an astronaut and infiltrates a spaceship. The other members of the ship suspect that there is an infiltrator, so now you must pass a simulated memory test (the human test) by highlighting the element that does not fit in the memory.

Eligible objects will be colored blue. Pick the lightest blue.

Game developed by Mauro E. Wehner.

Developed for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

Last updated: February 26, 2022.
